meanings.definition: A person or thing that develops something.
meanings.sent1: The developers of the new video game worked tirelessly to create an exciting experience for players.
meanings.sent2: The developers of the housing project are planning to build new homes in the area.
meanings.sent3: The developers of the recipe book added a secret ingredient that made all the dishes taste amazing.
meanings.sent4: The developers of the plot in the novel carefully crafted unexpected twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The developers of the app designed a user-friendly interface to attract more users.

meanings.definition: A person who develops real estate.
meanings.sent1: The developers purchased the land to build a shopping mall in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The real estate developers are considering different designs for the new apartment complex.
meanings.sent3: The developers joked that they could turn a tiny house into a luxurious mansion overnight.
meanings.sent4: The developers transformed the barren land into a bustling commercial area.
meanings.sent5: The developers negotiated with the local government to acquire permits for the construction project.

meanings.definition: A chemical used to develop photographs.
meanings.sent1: The photographers used the developers to bring out the images on the film.
meanings.sent2: The darkroom is stocked with various developers for processing different types of photos.
meanings.sent3: The developers spilled on the table, creating a colorful mess that resembled abstract art.
meanings.sent4: The old developers in the storage room had expired and needed to be replaced.
meanings.sent5: The developers enhanced the contrast in the black and white photos, making them more striking.
